title: A Global Perspective Of The Cannabis Industry With Raymond Harari
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Raymond Harari is the founder of Canalis Capital, a cannabis advisory company and merchant bank based in Panama, and one of the leading forces in getting Panama to legalize cannabis. He talked about this pursuit with Rena Sherbill, as well as the importance of having a long-term vision in this burgeoning industry. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
